attributes.action: Take more action against Climate Change and/or Global Warming
attributes.background: Water levels are rising, weather patterns are changing and air quality is worsening. We need to do something instead of ignoring the warning signs and keeping on polluting and littering and building up greenhouse gases and everything else. There's only one Earth.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230041
